#summary Examples of resources described by DSW

= An individual tree =
== URI: http://bioimages.vanderbilt.edu/vanderbilt/12-126 ==

Note in this example: 
 * the rdf:type is explicitly declared as a property.
 * the tree is both type LivingSpecimen (in an arboretum) and an IndividualOrganism.  
 * because it's also a LivingSpecimen, it has properties (such as catalog number) that a wild IndividualOrganism would not.

{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<rdf:RDF xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#"
	xmlns:rdfs="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#"
	xmlns:dcterms="http://purl.org/dc/terms/"
	xmlns:dwc="http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/"
	xmlns:dsw="http://purl.org/dsw/"
	xmlns:mrtg="http://xxx.org/XXX/"
	xmlns:xmp="http://ns.adobe.com/xap/1.0/"
	xmlns:bibo="http://purl.org/ontology/bibo/"
	xmlns:foaf="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"
>

<rdf:Description rdf:about="http://bioimages.vanderbilt.edu/vanderbilt/12-126">
	<rdf:type rdf:resource="http://purl.org/dsw/IndividualOrganism" />
	<rdf:type rdf:resource="http://purl.org/dsw/LivingSpecimen" />
	<mrtg:MetadataLanguage>en</mrtg:MetadataLanguage>
	
	<!--Basic information about the individual organism-->
	<dcterms:identifier>http://bioimages.vanderbilt.edu/vanderbilt/12-126</dcterms:identifier>
	<dcterms:description>Field individual of Ginkgo biloba L. with GUID: http://bioimages.vanderbilt.edu/vanderbilt/12-126</dcterms:description>
	<dsw:individualOrganismRemarks>This tree was miraculously spared from destruction in the building of the 21st Ave. crosswalk.</dsw:individualOrganismRemarks>
	
	<!-- Properties that the tree has by virtue of its LivingSpecimen type -->
	<dwc:collectionID rdf:resource="http://biocol.org/urn:lsid:biocol.org:col:35259" />
	<dwc:collectionCode>vanderbilt</dwc:collectionCode>
	<dwc:catalogNumber>12-126</dwc:catalogNumber>
	
	<!-- Relationships of the individual to other resources.  -->
	<foaf:isPrimaryTopicOf rdf:resource="http://bioimages.vanderbilt.edu/vanderbilt/12-126.rdf" />
	<foaf:isPrimaryTopicOf rdf:resource="http://bioimages.vanderbilt.edu/vanderbilt/12-126.htm" />
	<bibo:Webpage rdf:resource="http://bioimages.vanderbilt.edu/vanderbilt/12-126.htm" />
	
	<!-- Images that are derived from the individual -->
	<foaf:depiction rdf:resource="http://bioimages.vanderbilt.edu/baskauf/10502"/>
	<foaf:depiction rdf:resource="http://bioimages.vanderbilt.edu/baskauf/10557"/>
	<foaf:depiction rdf:resource="http://bioimages.vanderbilt.edu/baskauf/10556"/>
	<foaf:depiction rdf:resource="http://bioimages.vanderbilt.edu/baskauf/10554"/>
	
	<!-- Documented occurrences of the individual -->
	<dsw:hasOccurrence rdf:resource="http://bioimages.vanderbilt.edu/baskauf/10502#occ" />
	<dsw:hasOccurrence rdf:resource="http://bioimages.vanderbilt.edu/baskauf/10557#occ" />
	<dsw:hasOccurrence rdf:resource="http://bioimages.vanderbilt.edu/baskauf/10556#occ" />
	<dsw:hasOccurrence rdf:resource="http://bioimages.vanderbilt.edu/baskauf/10554#occ" />
	
	<!-- Identifications applied to the individual-->
	<dsw:hasIdentification>
		<rdf:Description rdf:about="http://bioimages.vanderbilt.edu/vanderbilt/12-126#2002-04-10baskauf">
			<dcterms:description>Determination of Ginkgo biloba L. sensu Flora of North America (1993) for the individual http://bioimages.vanderbilt.edu/vanderbilt/12-126</dcterms:description>
			<rdf:type rdf:resource="http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/Identification" />
			
			<!-- In lieu of stable external identifiers for taxon concepts, I'm defining some onsite -->
			<dsw:toTaxon rdf:resource="http://bioimages.vanderbilt.edu/taxonConcepts#183269-fna1993" />
			
			<dwc:identifiedBy>Steven J. Baskauf</dwc:identifiedBy>
			<dsw:idBy rdf:resource="http://bioimages.vanderbilt.edu/contact/baskauf" />
			<dwc:dateIdentified>2002-04-10</dwc:dateIdentified>
		
			<!-- Relationship of the identification to other resources -->
			<dsw:identifiedBasedOn rdf:resource="http://bioimages.vanderbilt.edu/baskauf/10554"/>
		</rdf:Description>
	</dsw:hasIdentification>
</rdf:Description>

<!--
Information about the metadata document itself
-->
<rdf:Description rdf:about="http://bioimages.vanderbilt.edu/vanderbilt/12-126.rdf">
	<dcterms:type rdf:resource ="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Document" />
	<dcterms:identifier>http://bioimages.vanderbilt.edu/vanderbilt/12-126.rdf</dcterms:identifier>
	<dcterms:description>RDF formatted description of the living organism http://bioimages.vanderbilt.edu/vanderbilt/12-126</dcterms:description>

	<dcterms:language>en</dcterms:language>
	<dcterms:modified>2010-11-08T11:13:49</dcterms:modified>

</rdf:Description>
</rdf:RDF>
}}}

= Taxon concept (used in identification of tree) =

{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<rdf:RDF xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#"
	xmlns:rdfs="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#"
	xmlns:dcterms="http://purl.org/dc/terms/"
	xmlns:dwc="http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/"
	xmlns:mrtg="http://xxx.org/XXX/"
	xmlns:xmp="http://ns.adobe.com/xap/1.0/"
	xmlns:tc="http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/TaxonConcept#"
>

<rdf:Description rdf:about="http://bioimages.vanderbilt.edu/taxonConcepts#183269-fna1993">
	<mrtg:MetadataLanguage>en</mrtg:MetadataLanguage>
	<rdf:type rdf:resource="http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/TaxonConcept#TaxonConcept" />
	<rdfs:label>Ginkgo biloba L. sensu Flora of North America</rdfs:label>
	<dcterms:description>Taxon concept of Ginkgo biloba L. sensu Flora of North America</dcterms:description>
	
	<tc:nameString>Ginkgo biloba L.</tc:nameString>
	<tc:hasName rdf:resource="http://www.ubio.org/authority/metadata.php?lsid=urn:lsid:ubio.org:namebank:468858" />
	<tc:accordingToString>Flora of North America; http://www.efloras.org/florataxon.aspx?flora_id=1&amp;taxon_id=200005235</tc:accordingToString>
	<!-- Note: URIs for accordingTo are not well developed.  At some point in the future, one would hope for an ISBN or doi link that 
	returns RDF
	<tc:accordingTo rdf:resource="http://someplace.org/reference/12345" />
	-->
	
	<!-- Note: the following properties are based on terms listed within the Taxon class of 
	the DwC standard.  Whether they are appropriately applied as properties of instances of the 
	Taxon class of DSW (vs. the tn:TaxonName class) remains to be see.  They are used as properties
	here because they are a convenient way to provide "atomized" parts of the name without requiring 
	the resolution of an external URI
	-->	
	<dwc:class>Ginkgoopsida</dwc:class>
	<dwc:order>Ginkgoales</dwc:order>
	<dwc:family>Ginkgoaceae</dwc:family>
	<dwc:genus>Ginkgo</dwc:genus>
	<dwc:specificEpithet>biloba</dwc:specificEpithet>
	<dwc:taxonRank>species</dwc:taxonRank>
	<dwc:vernacularName>maidenhair tree</dwc:vernacularName>
	<dwc:scientificNameAuthorship>L.</dwc:scientificNameAuthorship>
</rdf:Description>

<!--
Information about the metadata document itself
-->
<rdf:Description rdf:about="http://bioimages.vanderbilt.edu/vanderbilt/taxonConcepts.rdf">
	<dcterms:identifier>http://bioimages.vanderbilt.edu/vanderbilt/taxonConcepts.rdf</dcterms:identifier>
	<dcterms:description>RDF formatted description of taxon concepts used in the Bioimages website</dcterms:description>
	<dcterms:creator>Bioimages http://bioimages.vanderbilt.edu/</dcterms:creator>
	<foaf:maker rdf:resource="http://biocol.org/urn:lsid:biocol.org:col:35115" />
	<dcterms:language>en</dcterms:language>
	<dcterms:modified>2011-02-03</dcterms:modified>
	<xmp:MetadataDate>2011-02-03</xmp:MetadataDate>
</rdf:Description>
</rdf:RDF>
}}}

= An image of part of the tree = 
== URI: http://bioimages.vanderbilt.edu/baskauf/10554 ==
Note: the image is typed as a mrtg:MultiMediaObject.  It's properties are primarily described using terms from the MRTG (Audubon Core) vocabulary.  The Occurrence which is documented by the image is considered a separate resource.  It's properties are described by terms in the DwC class Occurrence.  The image and the Occurrence resource are related by the dsw:evidenceFor property of the image.  The dsw:hasEvidence property is not stated explicitly for the Occurrence but could be inferred by the inverse property relationship between evidenceFor and hasEvidence defined in dsw.  Note: because this image is a foaf:depiction of the tree, the range of foaf:depiction, which is foaf:Image asserts that the image is also rdf:type foaf:Image even though that is not explicitly stated in the RDF description of the image itself.
